name: 8-divide
title: 8 Divide
description: Check if the number you highlighted is divisable by 8. If it isn't, paste the up- or down rounded number
author: pkliem

commands.name: divide-by-8
commands.title: Divide by 8
commands.description: Only command. Check if the number you highlighted is divisable by 8. If it isn't, paste the up- or down rounded number

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
